actions: Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat and expels pus.
With Gan Cao, for Excess disorders in the Upper Jiao with no disorder in the Lower Jiao.
Moistens the Lungs, nourishes Stomach Yin and generates Fluids.
Spreads Liver Qi and relieves Stagnation.
Drains Heat, generates Fluids, relieves toxicity, expels pus, transforms Phlegm and reduces swelling.
Reduces swelling, eliminates toxins and expels pus.
With Jie Geng, for ulcerated boils when pus has not been discharged.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, relieves pain, clears Heat, cools the Blood,clears Liver Fire and reduces swelling from sores and abscesses.
Clears Heat especially in the Upper Jiao, relieves toxicity, reduces abscesses, dissipates clumps and clears Blood Heat.
Promotes lactation and unblocks Blood vessels.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.

syndromes: Liver Qi Stagnation with Heat and toxins

symptoms: Pain and distention along the flanks
